text: George Edward Morse (April 11, 1920 – December 6, 2012) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Chicago Bruins in two games and averaged 1.0 points per game. He attended Marquette University on an athletics scholarship but left after his freshman year to concentrate on his professional career. ==References== ==External links== *Chicago Tribune obituary Category:1920 births Category:2012 deaths Category:American army personnel of World War II Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Illinois Category:Chicago Bruins players Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Marquette University alumni Category:Military personnel from Illinois Category:Sportspeople from Chicago
title: George Morse (basketball)
